sentences.sContent: The government will have to create a special agency to underwrite small business loans.
sentences.sCn: 政府将不得不建立一个专门机构来为小额企业贷款提供担保。

words.tran: 保险公司；保险业者；承诺支付者；担保人

trans.tranOther: if an insurance company underwrites an insurance contract, it agrees to pay for any damage or loss that happens
